# NSApplication.RequestUserAttentionType.criticalRequest

**Case**

The user attention request is a critical request.

## Declaration

```swift
case criticalRequest
```

## Discussion

The dock icon will bounce until either the app becomes active or the request is canceled.

## Constants

- **NSApplication.RequestUserAttentionType.informationalRequest**: The user attention request is an informational request.

items.description: The user attention request is an informational request.
